titles.title: Deter PRC Aggression Against Taiwan Act
Deter PRC Aggression Against Taiwan Act
A bill to develop economic tools to deter aggression by the People's Republic of China against Taiwan.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported by Senator Risch with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 245.

committee.name: Senate Foreign Relations
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
